jobDescription: Pulse Secure is a great company giving companies around the world a piece of mind when it comes to their system security and secure access for their employees, partners, and customers  Our Operations team at Pulse Secure is looking for an organized and detail-oriented intern with a passion for operations and analytics. The assignments will include, but not be limited to: Who you areSomeone who is eager to learn and not afraid of pressure and challengesAnalytical, loving the numbers and the stories they tellStrives to become a great communicator, both verbally and in writingFocused, productive, and committed to the causePursuing a degree in Business, Mathematics, Operations, or AnalyticsWhat would you doQuickly become an expert in our Sales and Marketing processes, CRM (Salesforce) and adjacent tools like Marketo;Perform Sales and Marketing data and process analysis, to assure integrity, identifying the root cause of data inconsistencies and process defects, making recommendations and implementing timely corrective actions;Write documentation for requirements analysis, design specifications, user guides and operating procedures;Support the ongoing and recommend initiatives that align with the Sales Strategy;Provide day-to-day support to the Sales organization and the cross-functional partners. Apply for this Job
